TopicTitle: The Test MK16 Parachute contract in Career mode

Articles.Content:
Hi

 

I am new to this game.

I was trying to carry out this mission but i could not able to complete this

 

Can anyone tell me what exactly i need to do? I tried to activate the parachute when i have all the green ticks but still saying not complete

Am i missing something?
Move This Is Technical Issues Please Thank You Then We Can Discuss This.

Welcome to the Forums @domendemo, I've moved your thread to Gameplay Questions where it can get the proper attention it deserves.

24 minutes ago, miguelsgamingch said:

Move This Is Technical Issues Please Thank You Then We Can Discuss This.

It's best if you use the report button if you think a thread is in the wrong spot.  Posting in thread does nothing to help us find the thread and move it.

Either a glitch or you misunderstood something in the contract. Some mistakes I see people doing before:

* have a different part than the one the contract asks for, 

*not meeting all the conditions when performing the test

*reverting the flight after the test (effectively undoing the contract) 

 

In my experience the contract completes if you activate the part by staging if it ask for run test or the other way around, but have seen people telling it was a issue before. 

 

Also, the general consensus is that if you did the work is ok to use the debug menu to complete a contract.

Parachute contracts usually have a few parameters: the parachute itself (in this case, the Mk16 small stack parachute); an altitude range (say, 6km to 9km) and a speed range (for example, 150m/s to 250m/s) plus it will tell you if it wants you to click the ‘run test’ button in the part’s action window (right clicking then clicking the button) or by staging when the conditions are met.

7 hours ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

Parachute contracts usually have a few parameters: the parachute itself (in this case, the Mk16 small stack parachute); an altitude range (say, 6km to 9km) and a speed range (for example, 150m/s to 250m/s) plus it will tell you if it wants you to click the ‘run test’ button in the part’s action window (right clicking then clicking the button) or by staging when the conditions are met.

Resolved

I found out it only work by staging (space bar) to finish. Simply "right clicking then clicking the button" will not work

Thanks all anyway
